mapper.update: create table rss_subscribe ( id integer primary key autoincrement not null, source_id integer not null, group_id integer, user_id integer not null, enable boolean not null, update_time datetime not null, create_time datetime not null );
mapper.insert: insert into rss_subscribe (id, source_id, group_id, user_id, enable, update_time, create_time) values (#{id}, #{sourceId}, #{groupId}, #{userId}, #{enable}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime})
